verses.verse: <S%H3068>Behold,<s%> Yahweh makes the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1238>empty,<s%> makes it <S%H1110>waste,<s%> <S%H5753>turns<s%> it upside <S%H6440>down,<s%> and <S%H6327>scatters<s%> its <S%H3427>inhabitants.<s%>

It will be as with the <S%H5971>people,<s%> so with the <S%H3548>priest;<s%> as with the <S%H5650>servant,<s%> so with his <S%H113>master;<s%> as with the <S%H8198>maid,<s%> so with her <S%H1404>mistress;<s%> as with the <S%H7069>buyer,<s%> so with the <S%H4376>seller;<s%> as with the <S%H3867>creditor,<s%> so with the <S%H3867>debtor;<s%> as with the taker of <S%H5383>interest,<s%> <S%H834>so<s%> with the giver of <S%H5378>interest.<s%>
The <S%H776>earth<s%> will be <S%H1238>utterly<s%> <S%H1238>emptied<s%> and <S%H962>utterly<s%> laid <S%H962>waste;<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> this <S%H1697>word.<s%>

The <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H56>mourns<s%> and fades <S%H5034>away.<s%> The <S%H8398>world<s%> <S%H535>languishes<s%> and fades <S%H5034>away.<s%> The <S%H4791>lofty<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H535>languish.<s%>

The <S%H776>earth<s%> also is <S%H2610>polluted<s%> under its <S%H3427>inhabitants,<s%> because they have <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> the <S%H8451>laws,<s%> <S%H2498>violated<s%> the <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> and <S%H6565>broken<s%> the <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

Therefore the <S%H423>curse<s%> has <S%H398>devoured<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and those who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein are found <S%H816>guilty.<s%> Therefore the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> are <S%H2787>burned,<s%> and <S%H4213>few<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H7604>left.<s%>
The new <S%H8492>wine<s%> <S%H56>mourns.<s%> The <S%H1612>vine<s%> <S%H535>languishes.<s%> All the <S%H8056>merry-hearted<s%> <S%H584>sigh.<s%>

The <S%H4885>mirth<s%> of <S%H8596>tambourines<s%> <S%H7673>ceases.<s%> The <S%H7588>sound<s%> of those who <S%H5947>rejoice<s%> <S%H2308>ends.<s%> The <S%H4885>joy<s%> of the <S%H3658>harp<s%> <S%H7673>ceases.<s%>
They will not <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> with a <S%H7892>song.<s%> Strong <S%H7941>drink<s%> will be <S%H4843>bitter<s%> to those who drink <S%H8354>it.<s%>
The <S%H8414>confused<s%> <S%H7151>city<s%> is broken <S%H7665>down.<s%> Every <S%H1004>house<s%> is shut <S%H5462>up,<s%> that no man may come <S%H935>in.<s%>

There is a <S%H6682>crying<s%> in the <S%H2351>streets<s%> because of the <S%H3196>wine.<s%> All <S%H8057>joy<s%> is <S%H6150>darkened.<s%> The <S%H4885>mirth<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H1540>gone.<s%>
The <S%H5892>city<s%> is <S%H7604>left<s%> in <S%H8047>desolation,<s%> and the <S%H8179>gate<s%> is <S%H3807>struck<s%> with <S%H7591>destruction.<s%>

For it will be so in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> as the <S%H5363>shaking<s%> of an olive <S%H2132>tree,<s%> as the <S%H5955>gleanings<s%> when the <S%H1210>vintage<s%> is <S%H3615>done.<s%>
These shall lift <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H6963>voice.<s%> They will <S%H7442>shout<s%> for the <S%H1347>majesty<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> They cry <S%H6670>aloud<s%> from the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3513>glorify<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in the <S%H217>east,<s%> even the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> in the <S%H339>islands<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea!<s%>

From the uttermost <S%H3671>part<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> have we <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H2158>songs.<s%> <S%H6643>Glory<s%> to the <S%H6662>righteous!<s%> But I <S%H559>said,<s%> "I <S%H7334>pine<s%> <S%H7334>away!<s%> I pine <S%H188>away!<s%> woe is <S%H898>me!<s%>" The treacherous have dealt <S%H898>treacherously.<s%> <S%H898>Yes,<s%> the treacherous have dealt <S%H899>very<s%> <S%H898>treacherously.<s%>
<S%H6343>Fear,<s%> the <S%H6354>pit,<s%> and the <S%H6341>snare,<s%> are on you who <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

It will happen that he who <S%H5127>flees<s%> from the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H6343>fear<s%> will <S%H5307>fall<s%> into the <S%H6354>pit;<s%> and he who comes <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6354>pit<s%> will be <S%H3920>taken<s%> in the <S%H6341>snare;<s%> for the <S%H699>windows<s%> on <S%H4791>high<s%> are <S%H6605>opened,<s%> and the <S%H4146>foundations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H7493>tremble.<s%>
The <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H7489>utterly<s%> <S%H7489>broken.<s%> The <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H6565>torn<s%> <S%H6565>apart.<s%> The <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H4131>shaken<s%> <S%H4131>violently.<s%>

The <S%H776>earth<s%> will <S%H5128>stagger<s%> like a <S%H7910>drunken<s%> <S%H5128>man,<s%> and will sway back and <S%H5110>forth<s%> like a <S%H4412>hammock.<s%> Its <S%H6588>disobedience<s%> will be <S%H3513>heavy<s%> on <S%H5307>it,<s%> and it will fall and not <S%H6965>rise<s%> <S%H3254>again.<s%>

It shall happen in that <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H6485>punish<s%> the <S%H6635>army<s%> of the high <S%H4791>ones<s%> on <S%H4791>high,<s%> and the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%> on the <S%H127>earth.<s%>

They shall be gathered <S%H622>together,<s%> as <S%H616>prisoners<s%> are <S%H626>gathered<s%> in the <S%H953>pit,<s%> and shall be shut <S%H5462>up<s%> in the <S%H4525>prison;<s%> and after <S%H7230>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall they be <S%H6485>visited.<s%>

Then the <S%H3842>moon<s%> shall be <S%H2659>confounded,<s%> and the <S%H2535>sun<s%> <S%H954>ashamed;<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> will <S%H4427>reign<s%> on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> and before his <S%H2205>elders<s%> will be <S%H3519>glory.<s%>
